Class ModelStaticCacheBuilder


  • This class is used to build the cache of the entire EMF model and fetch the elements accordingly.
    This approach improves the performance of fetching the model elements based on name.
    Note:: Cache is built only once and it is not updated on model changes.
    Recommendation: This class shall be used in scenarios where "no" EMF model changes occur --> once the object of this class is created

      ModelStaticCacheBuilder(Amalthea root) 
      ModelStaticCacheBuilder(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.ResourceSet resourceSet)

    • Method Detail

      • getElementsBasedOnName

        public <T> List<T> getElementsBasedOnName(String name, Class<T> targetClass)
        This method is used to get the Amalthea model elements based on the supplied name and targetClass parameters
        Parameters:
        name - String. name of the Amalthea model element (e.g: Label name)
        targetClass - Class of the Amalthea model element (e.g: Label, Runnable, Task, ISR etc.,)
        Note : Supplied "Class" should be concrete class, for which EObject is created.
        Super class/Interface/Abstract classes are not supported
        Returns:
        List matching eObjects from Amalthea model

      • getElementsBasedOnRegex

        public <T extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> List<T> getElementsBasedOnRegex(String regularExpression, Class<T> targetClass)
        This method is used to get the Amalthea model elements based on the supplied regex for name and targetClass parameters
        Parameters:
        regexForName - String. name regex of the Amalthea model element (e.g: Label name)
        targetClass - Class of the Amalthea model element (e.g: Label, Runnable, Task, ISR etc.,)
        Note : Supplied "Class" should be concrete class, for which EObject is created.
        Super class/Interface/Abstract classes are not supported
        Returns:
        List matching eObjects from Amalthea model
